text: Leslie Roy Marston was an American Bishop of the Free Methodist Church of North America, elected in 1935. He also served as President of the National Association of Evangelicals. ==References== * Leete, Frederick DeLand, Methodist Bishops. Nashville, The Methodist Publishing House, 1948. Category:Free Methodist bishops Category:American Methodist bishops Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:20th- century Methodist bishops
title: Leslie Roy Marston
